content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron ore mine at position(x=-15.0, y=-50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0)
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0)
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0)
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0)
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5)
-  Chest (position x=40.5, y=-80.5)
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Coal storage at position(x=43.5, y=-82.5)
Consists of chest (position x=43.5, y=-82.5) with coal

### Lab at position(x=2.5, y=0.5)
Consists of lab (position x=2.5, y=0.5) and chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=3.5, y=0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=3.5, y=0.5) and chest (position x=2.5, y=0.5)

### Inserter system at position(x=0.5, y=3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position x=0.5, y=3.5) and chest (position x=0.5, y=2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when trying to use or place entities without sufficient resources
- Ensure you have sufficient resources (e.g., coal, pipes) in your inventory before attempting to use or place entities
### Errors when trying to extract or insert items without sufficient fuel
- Ensure you have sufficient fuel (e.g., coal) in your inventory before attempting to extract or insert items
### Errors when trying to place entities in occupied tiles
- Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity
### Errors when trying to connect entities without proper connections
- Ensure entities are properly connected (e.g., pipes, electricity) before attempting to use them
### Errors when trying to use entities without sufficient input
- Ensure entities have sufficient input (e.g., water, fuel) before attempting to use them
